body_html:
@peterlee0127 thank you for your answer.
i use 119GB SD card for swap memory so i think that enough to train model.
i execute train command in the Desktop PC to JTX1 by using ssh
so i stop lightdm service with your comment but i still get killed error.
i enforce to terminate training by using ctl+c and use run_cotext.request_stop() but i get same killd error.
why can't release tensorflow resource normally when process died.....

body:
@peterlee0127  thank you for your answer.
i use 119GB SD card for swap memory so i think that enough to train model.
i execute train command in the Desktop PC to JTX1 by using ssh
so i stop lightdm service with your comment but i still get killed error.
i enforce to terminate training by using ctl+c and use run_cotext.request_stop() but i get same killd error.
why can't release tensorflow resource normally when  process died.....
